channel.title: Errors when compiling
channel.description:
OK, these are the errors I get when I go to compile:
[code] client.java:1973: ';" expected for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl[u] [/u]99; lvl++> { client.java:1973: not a statement for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl [u]9[/u]9; lvl++> { client.java:1973: ';" expected for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl 99[u];[/u] lvl++> { client.java:1973: ';" expected for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl 99 lvl++[u]>[/u] {
4 errors Press any key to continue... [/code]
Parts that are underlined are the parts with the ^ under it. Please help :confused: :confused: :( :confused:

item.title: Errors when compiling
item.dc:creator: @Generalscape Generalscape
item.description:
@Generalscape wrote:

OK, these are the errors I get when I go to compile:

client.java:1973: ';" expected
                 for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl[u] [/u]99; lvl++> {
client.java:1973: not a statement
                 for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl [u]9[/u]9; lvl++> {
client.java:1973: ';" expected
                 for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl 99[u];[/u] lvl++> {
client.java:1973: ';" expected
                 for <int lvl = 1; lvl <= lvl 99 lvl++[u]>[/u] {

4 errors
Press any key to continue...

Parts that are underlined are the parts with the ^ under it. Please help
